description: NamedTagEventList relates a tag to its image history.

items.description: TagEvent is used by ImageStreamStatus to keep a historical record of images associated with a tag.

generation.description: Generation is the spec tag generation that resulted in this tag being updated

dockerImageReference.description: DockerImageReference is the string that can be used to pull this image

tag.description: Tag is the tag for which the history is recorded

items.description: TagEventCondition contains condition information for a tag event.

status.description: Status of the condition, one of True, False, Unknown.

generation.description: Generation is the spec tag generation that this status corresponds to

reason.description: Reason is a brief machine readable explanation for the condition's last transition.

message.description: Message is a human readable description of the details about last transition, complementing reason.

type.description: Type of tag event condition, currently only ImportSuccess

conditions.description: Conditions is an array of conditions that apply to the tag event list.
